DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate compare effect cervical scapulothoracic stabilization exercise without connective tissue massage ( CTM ) patient chronic mechanical neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Stabilization Exercises With Without Connective Tissue Massage Chronic Mechanical Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty patient chronic mechanical neck pain recruit randomly allocate stabilization exercise without connective tissue massage program . The study 's inclusion criterion follow : 18 65 year age , neck pain 3 month , volunteer . The exclusion criterion follow : stenosis , traumatic injury history , previous surgery related cervical spine , hypermobility , cancer , inflammatory rheumatologic , severe psychological disorder , pregnant , intervention include exercise physical therapy last 3 months.The program carry 12 session , 3 days/week 4 week . Pain intensity Visual Analog Scale , pressure pain threshold digital algometer , level anxiety Spielberger State Trait Anxiety Inventory , life quality Short Form-36 evaluate treatment .
DOC.criteria: 18 65 year age , neck pain 3 month , volunteer Stenosis , traumatic injury history , previous surgery related cervical spine , hypermobility , cancer , inflammatory rheumatologic , severe psychological disorder , pregnant , intervention include exercise physical therapy last 3 month
